sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import DrillEditForm from './DrillEditForm'; export default function DrillItem({ drill, editMode, editedDrill, onStartEdit, onCancelEdit, onSaveEdit, onDelete, onFieldEdit }) { return (
{editMode[drill.id] ? ( <> ) : ( <> )}

{drill.name}

{editMode[drill.id] ? ( ) : (
Purpose:{' '}{drill.purpose || 'Needs data.'}
Plane:{' '}{drill.plane || 'Needs data.'}
Muscles:{' '}{drill.muscles || 'Needs data.'}
Joint Actions:{' '}{drill.joint_actions || 'Needs data.'}
Nervous System:{' '}{drill.nervous_system || 'Needs data.'}
Psych Components:{' '}{drill.psych_components || 'Needs data.'}
Tendons Loaded:{' '}{drill.tendons_loaded || 'Needs data.'}
Influences:{' '}{drill.influences || 'Needs data.'}
Execution Needs:{' '}{drill.execution_needs || 'Needs data.'}
Regression:{' '}{drill.regression || 'Needs data.'}
)}
); }
